name: The admin shall be able to provide the order of performance when creating / updating a performance
The system shall show the map of the location of the venue
The system shall show the promoted shows in the front page
The admin shall be able to provide the Meta tags for shows
The admin shall be able to provide the Meta tags for artistes
The admin shall be able to provide the Meta tags for performances
The admin shall be able to provide the Meta tags for venues
The admin shall be able to provide the Meta Tags for Front Page
The admin shall be able to provide the Meta Tags for Default Pages
The system shall show the line-up of performers for each promoted show in the front page
The system shall prioritize the headline act for a show when displaying the performers in the front page
